name: Arcade 17
description:
This is an arcade game where the goal is to score as many points as possible.

Controls: left, right and down arrow keys or A, S, D. Press R to restart.

A cube with a random color will fall and you have to direct it towards the wall of the same color. If the square touches a different color, it's game over.

You can score extra points by pressing the correct arrow key when the square is touching a wall of the same color.

The speed increases as you score more points.

Have fun!

Made during Global Game Jam 2020
